title: Pixel 3, shaking rear camer, not working microphone
content: Hi, I m rlly angry about GOOGLE, I owned first Pixel. after 2 years I got problem with microphone bcs google make some wrong update... But I was stupid and I still believe him and bought Pixel 3. After 1,5 yrs I have almost the same problem with phone. My microphone is not working and even my rear camera is without stabilization, always shaking.... I tried everything, so can me somebody tell what i should do?
